Package client

Class Publisher

java.lang.Object
client.Publisher
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Publisher extends Object implements Runnable
A Publisher generates and publishes messages to a specified topic on a MessageBroker. This class implements Runnable to allow instances to be run in separate threads.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    Publisher(MessageBroker broker, Topic topic)
    Constructs a Publisher with the specified MessageBroker and Topic.

      public Publisher(MessageBroker broker, Topic topic)
      Constructs a Publisher with the specified MessageBroker and Topic.

      broker - the MessageBroker to publish messages to

  • Method Details

    • setSpeed

      public static void setSpeed(int speed)
      Sets the speed (in milliseconds) at which messages are generated and published.
      Parameters:
      speed - the new speed (in milliseconds) for message publication

    • run

      public void run()
      Continuously generates and publishes messages to the specified Topic at intervals determined by the speed parameter. The method runs in a separate thread.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
